00037 #include "egs_source_collection.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 EGS_SourceCollection::EGS_SourceCollection(EGS_Input *input,
00041         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSource(input,f), nsource(0), count(0) {
00042     vector<EGS_BaseSource *> s;
00043     egsInformation("EGS_BaseSource::EGS_BaseSource: input is:\n");
00044     input->print(0,cout);
00045     EGS_Input *isource;
00046     while ((isource = input->takeInputItem("source",false))) {
00047         egsInformation("EGS_SourceCollection: got input\n");
00048         EGS_BaseSource *this_source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(isource);
00049         if (!this_source) {
00050             egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: got null source\n");
00051         }
00052         else {
00053             s.push_back(this_source);
00054         }
00055         delete isource;
00056     }
00057     vector<string> snames;
00058     int err = input->getInput("source names",snames);
00059     if (!err) {
00060         for (unsigned int j=0; j<snames.size(); j++) {
00061             EGS_BaseSource *this_source = EGS_BaseSource::getSource(snames[j]);
00062             if (!this_source) {
00063                 egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: got null source\n");
00064             }
00065             else {
00066                 s.push_back(this_source);
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070     if (s.size() < 1) {
00071         egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: no sources\n");
00072         return;
00073     }
00074     vector<EGS_Float> prob;
00075     err = input->getInput("weights",prob);
00076     if (err) {
00077         egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: missing 'weights' input\n");
00078         return;
00079     }
00080     if (prob.size() != s.size()) {
00081         egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: the number of sources (%d) is not"
00082                    " the same as the number of input probabilities (%d)\n",
00083                    s.size(),prob.size());
00084         return;
00085     }
00086     setUp(s,prob);
00087 }
00088 
00089 void EGS_SourceCollection::setUp(const vector<EGS_BaseSource *> &S,
00090                                  const vector<EGS_Float> &prob) {
00091     otype = "EGS_SourceCollection";
00092     nsource = S.size();
00093     if (prob.size() < nsource) {
00094         nsource = prob.size();
00095     }
00096     description = "Invalid source collection";
00097     if (isValid()) {
00098         p = new EGS_Float [nsource];
00099         EGS_Float *dum = new EGS_Float [nsource];
00100         sources = new EGS_BaseSource* [nsource];
00101         Emax = 0;
00102         for (int j=0; j<nsource; j++) {
00103             p[j] = prob[j];
00104             sources[j] = S[j];
00105             if (p[j] < 0 || !sources[j]) {
00106                 if (p[j] < 0) egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: input "
00107                                              "probability p[%d]=%g is less than zero.\n",j,p[j]);
00108                 else {
00109                     egsWarning("EGS_SourceCollection: source %d is null\n",j);
00110                 }
00111                 delete [] p;
00112                 delete [] dum;
00113                 for (int i=0; i<j; j++) {
00114                     EGS_Object::deleteObject(sources[i]);
00115                 }
00116                 delete [] sources;
00117                 nsource = 0;
00118                 return;
00119             }
00120             dum[j] = 1;
00121             sources[j]->ref();
00122             EGS_Float e = sources[j]->getEmax();
00123             if (e > Emax) {
00124                 Emax = e;
00125             }
00126         }
00127         table = new EGS_AliasTable(nsource,dum,p,0);
00128         delete [] dum;
00129         description = "Source collection";
00130         last_cases = new EGS_I64 [ nsource ];
00131         for (int i=0; i<nsource; i++) {
00132             last_cases[i] = 0;
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }

00137 extern "C" {
00138 
00139     EGS_SOURCE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource *createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00140             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00141         return
00142             createSourceTemplate<EGS_SourceCollection>(input,f,"source collection");
00143     }
00144 
00145 }
